author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man was hacked to death by a gang of five at MGR Nagar in Manimangalam near Padappai. According to the police, Santhosh Kumar (22), who works as a mechanic, closed his shop and was walking back home on Sunday night, when five men on bikes chased him down and hacked him. The assailants fled the scene, leaving Santhosh in a pool of blood. Passersby rushed him to the Tambaram Taluk Government Hospital, where doctors declared him dead on arrival.

The Manimangalam police have registered a case and special teams have been formed to investigate the murder, a police official who visited the spot said.
title: Mechanic hacked to death
